a.n: Monsieur Malakian, Vie, Mort Et RÃ©surrection D'henri Verneuil

p.d: Born into an Armenian family from Turkey, Achod Malakian, alias Henri Verneuil, became interested in the cinema early on. This is his intimate portrait, with contributions from friends and a number of his cult films: "La Vache et le Prisonnier", "Un singe en hiver" and "Le Clan des Siciliens". Directed by: Benjamin Clavel (France, 2016)
